title: Shimano Might Be Developing a Lighter, More Compact e-Bike System for Road & Gravel
content:
A recent patent from Shimano reveals a new, more compact e-bike motor system for gravel bikes and road bikes.

Read the full article at Shimano Might Be Developing a Lighter, More Compact e-Bike System for Road & Gravel on Velo.
